website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for a first-time juicer looking to make small, personal amounts of juice.
pros: For such an affordable juicer this model produces a quality juice
The pulp container fills quickly, but if you're looking to make about 2 quarts of juice this will not be an issue
We suggest putting a plastic bag in the pulp collection container to make the clean up process even simpler
The pulp was left quite dry, another surprise based on the price point
cons: Juicer does produce a bit of a mess on your counter top

website_summaries.verdict: A spacious, powerful juicer at a  favorable price, making it a good choice for those whose budget is tight.
pros: Has a super wide chute a powerful motor
Owners rave about how easy it is to clean
cons: Taking the blade out requires some fiddling

customer_reviews.title: Lots of waste but overall pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is just about as good as can be expected for the price. Clean-up is easy, and that's good because it's rather messy. I usually end up with juice and pulp scattered around the counter from the process of running the pulp through a second time. I've posted a video below to show what I mean. In it I'm processing pineapple and orange juice. It bothers me that the pulp still has so much juice left in it that I'm unable to get out. But I wanted something cheap and I guess you can't have it all.
customer_reviews.author: orchid

customer_reviews.title: Juicing made  easy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a novice juicer but I use this product daily to juice celery stalks. It amazes me how quickly it extracts the maximum amount of juice leaving very dry pulp. And the fact that it's so easy to use and to clean up is important to me. I haven't tried juicing any other fruit or vegetable with it, but for celery, it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Marie

customer_reviews.title: Word warranty only...no result
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine till it breaks. Called the manufacturer they said they would replace it. Gave them all the information, cut the cord like they suggested and mailed all in. This all took place in January, as of this writing we have not received the replacement they said was coming. Called again and their excuse the return address was wrong they were goin to send out another. Today is March 2nd, our original call was in January, still no replacement. Looks like their warranty program is just words. I would not purchase again from Hamilton Beach any of their products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drinking my way to Healthy
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is so easy to use, quiet, and also to clean. I had in the beginning made enough to last a while so I wouldn't have to clean it so often, but I've found that I prefer the juice when it's just made, and having to clean it each time is really no big deal. I was in the midst of a kitchen remodel and had a juice station made for myself ...loving my new healthy lifestyle. Extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: This product was hugely disappointing. It slid around the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was hugely disappointing. It slid around the countertop during juicing process. The juice coming out therefore missed the container it collects in. A strong smell of smoke emitted from the juicer. Black dust collected under the device ( I think this was connected to the burning smell). My apartment carried the stench of smoke/burning for many hours. Understandably I returned this item immediately. Currently awaiting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: beverley emirali

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful, hard to clean, needs constant cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It has to be constantly cleaned to assure that it works properly. It is very wasteful otherwise. Even when cleaned several times during a single juicing, it seemed inefficient to me. The juice was great, but a smoothie prevents you from throwing away expensive fruit. It totally clogged up my dishwasher when I cleaned it. I returned this after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: How to use it
customer_reviews.text: I think for the price you can’t beat this ! I would put a plastic bag for the exit part you not using for easy clean up . I would also buy a Steel scrub brush to clean the blade part the brush that comes with it does not clean as well Recipe ; Two carrots Two apples Two cucumbers Use very large container and this will make three median size glasses - 8 oz each glass Drink one every day and put the rest in the fridge and store - stir before serving Delicious !!!
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Love to give this zero stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this juicer and after using it for a few months, it started jumping all over the counter and the metal piece inside would cut into the plastic. Very unsafe. I called Hamilton Beach and they were very helpful and sent me out a replacement unit. The problem is that the very first time I used it, the exact same thing happened and plastic clippings were all over the inside. I have given up with this unit and am VERY disappointed to the point where I don't even want to call them back because it's just going to happen again. Plus, Hamilton Beach will send you out a replacement, but you need to pay for the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Juicer -
customer_reviews.text: I've had other juicers so basing review on comparison. This juicer does not extract much juice from the fresh carrots, beets, ginger, vegies. Juiced 4 med carrots, 1 red beet (cut in quarters) 1/4 rutabaga, small piece of ginger and garlic clove which only produced less than 1/2 c of juice. This is not normal. Unfortunately, I was't able to use this juicer until after my 30 return window expired thinking it would be fine - but it wasn't I'm giving it away. The really unfortunate part is that I've recommended this juicer to two people and hopefully they can return it. I bought another brand with 1100w motor. Hoping this is the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jennin2

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful
customer_reviews.text: This product worked so poorly that I returned it within 24hrs. The pulp it made was still holding half it's juice, and it didn't even juice the kale, it just chopped it into peices and discarded it. I wasted easily half of the produce I put in it. With how many people positively reviewed this item, maybe I just got a bad one? It is nice that it came with a brush for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jael Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE to CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to juicing; I thought buying the cheapest was a bad idea, but the reviews were good. I have no idea why they were. This thing is impossible to clean. You cannot remove the filter from the machine to clean it! The veggies and fruit also get in between the filter and the machine, which i'm sure isn't good for it in the long run. The juice it produced was good, but the cleaning and the leaking were terrible. If you're going to Juice, you have to buy something with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Michigander

customer_reviews.title: Great juice, big mess!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this juicer. It makes a good amount of juice for the price. My only issue with it is that it makes a huge mess, the parts don’t stay attached and it didn’t come with a juice cup so I have to use a glass cup. Lots of clean up involved but great tasting juice.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Actually kind of upset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it had the best description of all of the juicers i could find on amazon with a reasonable price. It works as it should, however, im actually kind of disappointed that it advertises a cleaning tool and a cup but it doesnt even come with it. the manual says "select models only" but the kind i bought doesnt say anything about select models, which leaves you to believe it comes with it. This was chosen in comparison to many others i found on amazon and the comparisons being a cleaning tool and i didnt even get that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this didn't even come with the little cup it's supposed to come with, but I wasn't going to go through the hassle of returning. Second, after using this every morning for a couple of weeks, it started to have this weird burning smell, which transferred over to the taste of whatever juice I was making. It was horrible. And the top piece that gets clamped down, suddenly didn't seal anymore. DO NOT BUY THIS. THERE IS A REASON IT IS CHEAP.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I see many reviews that are critical of the pulp generated. I really don't know what they are talking about. This juicer works just fine. I have even re-juiced my pulp on occasion and there was no liquid in it. So the idea that a $300 model would juice better seems like a lie. No one needs a juicer better than this. If you want to be really cheap just use an Oster blender and a cheese cloth bag. No one needs a $100 plus blender -they are just lifestyle cherries for the foolish and stupid. Most people get sick of juicing after a single spurt so get this one, save your money and splurge the savings on quality veggies.
customer_reviews.author: DC Person

customer_reviews.title: Not great...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this juicer started making very loud popping noises and smelled like burnt rubber after only a month of use, juicing 16 oz of celery each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Super juicer
customer_reviews.text: So I decided on a juicer because I did not want to spend $9.00 on a cup of juice at my fav juice place , I must say pretty cool stuff mix carrots ginger and oranges and voila super juice at home worth every penny, cleaning is a little pain but I love the juicer and able to juice everything I want ...give it a try for you health you worn regret..this machine has great power pulsivies all the way the pulp get super dry it really takes out all the juice and u can use the Peggy pulp for soups ..delish!
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer! Our previous juicer was the Jack LaLane one. Hubby was swayed by an infomercial and I never liked the thing. I was happy when it finally gave out. So I researched best juicers 2019, and this juicer popped up on several lists. And the price was fantastic! So I crossed my fingers and ordered it. And I was not disappointed! Easy to assemble/disassemble, easy to clean, even includes a brush to clean the basket! Juices fast, and it’s pretty powerful! A little noisy but I can live with that. I swear I get better results with this then I ever did with my Jack LaLane. I’m glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: KC C.

customer_reviews.title: What a mess.
customer_reviews.text: So that container that holds the trash is supposed to fit against that top piece that holds it down. When it gets just half full and there’s any foam in there it starts leaking outside the juicer. Everytime I use it it’s an absolute mess with spatter like a crime scene. Lots of power, I haven’t encountered anything that’s given me trouble. I don’t do a lot of green juices so I can’t testify to how it is with veggies. Any apples or strawberries will come out thiccccc like a smoothie, not a juice. Unfortunately I hate smoothies. I only use it for citrus juicing.
customer_reviews.author: 🦄

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is very easy, as is clean up. It's a powerful little juicer. I like its size.
customer_reviews.text: I first used it to juice carrots, and boy am I pleased! It did such a good job! The pulp was dryish, which means it got the juice out, it ground them so well I hardly had to use the stopper and the juice was cold. With other juicers they heat up thus heating up the juice, not this one. Fresh cool carrot juice in minutes. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several juicers in the past but this is by far my favorite. It works even better than the one I used when I worked in a juice bar. I couldn't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT affordable juicer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a reasonably priced juicer to make sure I actually LIKED juicing first. I decided to go with this one based off it's reviews, and I really don't plan on upgrading any time soon! This juicer does a great job and it's so easy to clean. I love that it comes with a brush to get the pulp out of the mesh part too. For anyone who wants to start juicing without breaking the bank, definitely try this one out. PROS: Easy to clean, not too bulky on counter, comes apart easily, juices well. CONS: Loud (but what do you expect when you're extracting the juice out of fruits and veggies?)
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: Odd Design & Makes a Mess
customer_reviews.text: I liked this juicer but I didn’t like the mess it left behind. For some reason there’s a slit at the top right so when juicing carrots they were flying out of that slit and all over my counter. Also, if you move it the container in the back just falls out of place, not secure at all. Returned it and am looking for a different juicer. If you don’t mind a mess every time you juice then this is great.
customer_reviews.author: OneVeganChick

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but Overall a Good Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Good juicer! It has pulverized everything I've thrown at, or should I say in it. It is clunky, and when in use, it's deafening - almost sounds like you're doing restoration work in your kitchen. It can also cause quite a mess sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: 8Bit-BMO

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Fells fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Wife makes beets, carrots and apples juice which is condensed but energizing!!! The device plastic feels fragile, and we are being extra-careful cleaning it after use. Thank god I don't have to be as careful with the BBQ grill, otherwise I'd probably stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoranson

customer_reviews.title: IT'S WEIRD
customer_reviews.text: I paid much more for mine- brought from overstock. it's extremely loud , it also moves although its sitting flat on table. i would like to see more juice for the amount of ginger i put in. the big mouth is a good idea but don't bother to put any large items in the mouth still will have minimum amount of juice. it's a struggle to juice ginger root -you get more trash than juice. it also leaks from the side. Clean up not bad
customer_reviews.author: rozzy nyc

customer_reviews.title: A true Jeff Bezos special.
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of hidden where this was made, but as soon as you open the package, you think to yourself, "Dammit, another Chinese piece of crap." It works, minimally. It throws rinds everywhere, making cleanup a chore. It required cleaning with a finger after 4 oranges (about 2 cups of juice) to clear the hopper. The centrifuge creates so much heat that my refrigerated oranges came out room temperature. The plastic pieces seem easy to break, don't fit particularly well together, and the whole machine gently rocks as it is not properly balanced. But it does give you juice. Frothy, but no pulp, and quickly. 3 ⭐
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Should have waited
customer_reviews.text: I should have held out for a better model. This one needs to be disassembled and cleaned after every 8 oz or the filter clogs, pulp accumulates under the hood instead of falling into the bin, juice spatters, and blade is hard to remove and clean even with the included brush. And you have to hold it down while using or it will walk all over your kitchen. But the juice is great and the unit processes everything including chard and spinach.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Not good for everyday use!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great juicer for beginners to see if you like it. This is a fast powered juicer, so it warms the juice up. It leaves a nasty foam at the top and eventually doesnt give you as much juice as it did in the beginning. Probably great for 1 time a month use. I bought this early June and it is August, looking for a new juicer of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this for celery and oranges so far but both worked great- celery juice even comes out sweet.. my first time using this type of juicer.. Super compact, doesn’t take up too much counter space and the cleaning brush it comes w also helps a lot. I read online a lot looking for a low cost high quality juicer that I could use for celery- this one was recommended- as a good entry / starter juicer that is high quality and that turned out to be true..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good buy. It is easy to use and super easy to disassemble, clean and reassemble. As other reviewers have stated, it is super loud. I would not recommend using it at night if you have light sleepers at home :) I would recommend it though. It can fit small, whole apples and all kinds of sliced fruits. I am having fun using it and making all sorts of natural drinks. I love the fact that the juice come right out into my mug. Also, you may have to take out the residue and re-juice it because it does not seem to squeeze it enough to get all the juices out.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review here.
customer_reviews.text: So, as long as you are pushing the fruits/vegetables/whatever through SLOWLY, it comes out great! If you do it any faster than that, you're going to lose a lot of your fruit/veggies. Clean up was a nightmare, but I think that's part of the juicing gig. Over all, I liked it a lot once I figured out to push my items through slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It works well but it's time consuming to clean
customer_reviews.text: This juicer does an amazing job at juicing almost anything we put in it. We found that bananas don't work but that's because of the makeup of the fruit and I doubt any juicer could do better. It takes a bit of work to get all the pulp out of the screen and everywhere else inside the unit. At this point we barely use it because of how much work it is to clean. We just make smoothies with our blender instead, much easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: loving my new juicer
customer_reviews.text: So I made the mistake of purchasing a black and decker first and used it for 10 minutes and thought juicing may not be for me. If only I purchased this juicer first, little to no prep time, super easy to clean and disassemble. I only had it for a couple days it hasn't malfunctioned yet as the other did, so I'm happy. I was able to make a gallon of juice relatively quick, hoping this last.
customer_reviews.author: txgreat

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My first juicer so I. Any compare to others but OMG this one is great and fantastic price! I’ll be honest, I hadn’t done much research on juicers nor did I read the the instructions but this was so easy to use and results were great! I’ve used it every day since I received it and I couldn’t be happier. Can’t wait to experiment with more recipes. Oh, and very easy to clean, the brush is 100% awesome for the blade and everything is dishwasher safe-can’t beat that! I need to make sure to have something easy to clean for busy days and just any day! Lol
customer_reviews.author: sasha

customer_reviews.title: Starter juicer
customer_reviews.text: If your like me and new to the juicing world than go for this juicer. I looked for really expensive ones and wasn’t sure if the investment would be worth it cause i didn’t know if i would like juicing. So i looked for one that is affordable and i love. Is one. I juice everyday and it works so fine for me. Main thing for me is cleaning! It’s so easy literally can take the parts off, wash and put back on. I just hate the brush they have with it to clean the metal grinder part. The bristles get stuck in it all the time and rip off buttttt still amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't juice great, difficult to clean, too noisy
customer_reviews.text: It is not too bad if you will juice just one thing such as cucumber or celery..but it gets clogged easily if you juice multiple things.. Many people using other juicers seem to be getting close to 16 oz juice from one bunch of celery whereas with this you can get around 8oz.. It is not the most expensive juicer so maybe that's what you get for that price. Also, not very easy to clean. I wish I could return this. It has been only a month.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: BEST Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this juicer for about a month now and WOW! This thing does the job! I have currently juiced celery and strawberries, but I am sure it will do great with other foods. Clean up is easy, and it stores away with no hassle. It's also not heavy like most juicers are. It was cheaper in price than most but it works just as good as the ones going for $100 or more. I Love my juicer!!!
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Eh... not so great
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner juicer and bought this juicer for a 10 day juice cleanse. It was ok. Overall I felt like it wasted a lot of produce and by the end of the 10 days I was pretty done with it. It barely juiced leafy greens at all. Some things like mint, cilantro and cabbage I felt like just was just spit out into the pulp bin. Maybe it’s ok for a beginner juicer on a budget but otherwise I wish I had purchased a more expensive one. I feel like it was a lot of my money I spent on organic produce.
customer_reviews.author: Melly Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while, not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter juicer and good for the price, but the blade can't handle daily use for very long. Within 6 months of using it 3-4 times a day the blade is super dull and doesn't juice very well at all. If you are planning on being an occasional juicer this is a great purchase. If you plan on juicing for a long while... Pay for a nicer juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Rocks
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you can't go wrong here. I had one of the more expensive ones a couple years ago and it didn't work any better than this one. Everything about it is simple, it juices like a beast and I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ackpfft

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a over a year now and I juice on average a few times a month and it's been working well for us. I put a bag in the container which collects the "waste" which helps with cleaning. Cleaning the juicer part with the grates in them is also easier than I thought it would be...I simply use scotch brite under running water and it cleans up in quickly. Using the brush they send with it takes longer. The juices are delicious and I compost the "waste"
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give negative stars . PLEASE dont waste your money and buy something better . Within few weeks of using this , the top part of the plunger came off ( have attached a picture for reference) . And today while juicing some celery it sparked , I could smell some burning smell . I unplugged it immediately and let it cool down . Please go look elsewhere and buy something better and also avoid the risk of fire . 0 stars for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abe kap

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We brought this machine because my mom want to drink fresh juice with out the pulse. I have put everything from apple, mangoes, oranges, carrots and even some greens in there and it blend it beautifully. I just hate the loud noise and sometimes when it blend the machine moves so your cup will move and juice will spilled. I would recommend putting a towel underneath the machine, if any juice is spilled or other messes.
customer_reviews.author: redlotuz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, fairly easy to clean up. Produce bags are just the right size to put in as liners in the waste bin. The scrubber makes cleanup really easy. Sturdy; like the metal clamp. Chomps through apples easily; haven't yet used it on veggies.
customer_reviews.author: CWH

customer_reviews.title: It breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: It may be good for beginners but it will not likely stay with you for the long haul. I used mine daily and at 3 months it began to smell of burning plastic. I cleaned it immediately following use each day and dried each piece and it still did not last. It served me well for the time it worked but it did not last as long as I thought it would based on the articles of recommendation I found online.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Fritz

customer_reviews.title: it wastes fruit and vegetables
customer_reviews.text: I use to have a very good juicer but it broke. I bought this juicer for price and reviews, the only thing I have to say is : you may not notice how weak this juicer is unless you use a good juicer. when I touch the fiber collected in the waste basket you can see that it still has lots of juice in it that was not pulled out. It is good for occasional juicers but too much waste of fruits and vegetable if you are an avid juicer.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Juices well, but loud--which is manageable.
customer_reviews.text: This juicer was super easy to assemble, vey easy clean up as well... BUT... If you place it directly onto the counter, it is LOUD... sounds like a jack hammer in a construction zone and will sort of 'bounce around' the counter. My solution was to place a terry cloth hand towel on the counter and place the juicer onto the towel. Voila! The sound was 50% less and the device stayed put. Literally quieter than a blender now and the device did not move at all. All in all it works fine and I am able to juice without worrying about my neighbors thinking I'm doing construction inside my home. Not a bad deal after all for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased KitchenAid Slow Juicer and Sauce Stand Mixer Attachment $140 and it was really hard to clean went in house attic and sitting there in years, my brother in law recemented me to purchase Hamilton Beach Juicer it is a life changer more then 5 star rating prefect easy to clean and we are enjoying it since .
customer_reviews.author: syeda begum

customer_reviews.title: Mesmerizing!
customer_reviews.text: I bet there are tons of other juicers for better/more qualities, but this guy fit all my needs and my budget! Not so loud, is quick and simple as well as safe to use! The cleaning does not bother me, I just rinse it right away not to let leftovers get stuck later. It comes with a brush for the inside part where particles can get stuck, I brush them off to the side and voila! Fresh juice, clean juicer and happy human right here!!
customer_reviews.author: Lina M. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer barely works, it is inefficient. I ran out of time to return it. I would've wanted a refund if it was still eligible for return. Barely juices, just makes a giant mess. Complete waste of money. It is just a good looking Juicer. It's a counter ornament now.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This juicer -- I am impressed!! It easily and thoroughly juiced my beets, celery and kale. The pulp was dry. One review said it's terribly noisy but I didn't find it so. Yes, noisy but so is my osterizer. I did place the juicer on a dish towel for some padding to possibly soften the sound. Easy to assemble, easy to clean, I am DELIGHTED with this juiicer. I've used it once - it's maiden voyage. I guess the only test will be longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Horses Flying

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe/unsanitary/Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Must have gotten a defective model - got it from amazon; spun it up had a bad smell. Thought it was just an artifact because it was new - then I juiced one apple, drank some (good) but then opened the machine to clean and notices some of the plastic from the inside of the juicer was worn away by the cutting element - and yes, tiny bits in the glass. Thanks very much. Returning. Would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: strategery

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go along with the celery juice craze. Works really well. I put a grocery bag in the container where the pulp comes out so I can just toss that in the trash for easy cleanup. Everything else I toss in the dishwasher. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: CCisme

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've bought this year.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try juicing after reading about all the benefits from it. So i came to amazon in search of a decent priced juicer to start out with. I found this one and read the reviews and decided this was the one to try. I am so glad i did, I have been juicing every day and its so fun to try different blends of fruits and veggies. My boyfriend has been loving the juices as well. I also read in another review to add a plastic bag in the trash bin part to make clean super easy and YES it works perfectly, easy clean up! Love mines! Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: JLavii

customer_reviews.title: After many months still works like new
customer_reviews.text: I use it at least once a week to make a carrot and orange juice (usually around half a gallon for the family ) After all these months of use it still works like new. It is easy to clean and store. Great budget juicer
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worked until well until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This worked very however after 5 months it stopped working. It wouldn’t power on. I thought at first it was a power outlet and after trying a different outlet it still didn’t work. Possibly blown fuse after reading differ reviews FAQ about it. However when it did work it well.
customer_reviews.author: Tashara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This baby is powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and the reviews are right! This bad boy is POWERFUL...and a little noisy but hey it comes with the territory. My recommendation is I assemble and reassemble it before you use it so you understand how the machine is set up. The food pusher is awesome and really the clean up is not bad. I juiced beets, celery, apples, leafy greens and more! I recommend cleaning it in hot water right after use or the crud will stain and be hard to come off. I’ve made over a gallon of fresh juices already and can’t wait to do more! For under $100...don’t think twice about purchasing this juicer!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Rozay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this! He got it to make green juices and all those super "In" things now. The only downside is that it doesn't come with a collection cup for the juice itself and the spout is a little low, so he had to put a big bowl under the spout and then transfer the juice into the pitcher. It is very loud, but worth the price (which is a lot less than some other juicers he was about to buy) and it definitely gets the job done! Easy to clean, we just put everything in the dishwasher, and it comes out looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome juicer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this juicer. I had a Jack Lalane juicer before and had to leave it behind due to moving and missed it so much. Bought this instead and for the price it’s amazing. Within the first week I’ve made 3 different kinds of juices including ginger shots for the immune system and it works wonderfully. It’s very easy to clean specially as soon as you’re done using it so things don’t dry up in the crevices.
customer_reviews.author: melissa.freeman06

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall. You need to ensure to secure how the blade sits.... just apply gentle pressure to ensure blade is seated correctly or it will make a loud noise as it will grinds against the sorroundinf sleeve that the blade and filter housing sits on.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Expectations exceeded!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this Hamilton Beach juicer. There's plenty of power, yet it's not too loud. It's also very easy to clean, assemble, and disassemble. It does a very good job in extracting the juice from vegetables and fruits, as there is very little moisture remaining in the leftover pulp. Its compact size makes it ideal for small kitchens or for storage. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: S. Dawes

customer_reviews.title: Decent juicer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is powerful, and works well so far. Build quality seems to be decent especially givin the price. This is our first juicer, so we didn't really want to spend alot of money on a maybe. Were pleased with it so far. It isn't the easiest to clean up, especially if you use fruits with small seeds, like strawberries and kiwis...i will say it is worth the clean up, absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Willis

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and used it. I almost didn't get it because of the reviews and man are the negative ones stupid. It's a juicer. There will be some mess. I juiced a qt and the clean up was easy and quick. There was not juice everywhere. It took me 3 minutes to clean it. It's not crazy loud. It has a motor in it. Duh. If you are looking for an affordable juicer. Get this. You should be stupid not too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great juicer and there is a cleaning tool with it that makes cleaning it a breeze! I had a problem with the first one and the company didn't even blink an eye and sent a new one with the return of the old one. Good customer service For the money, you can't beet the quality. I also own a Hamilton Beach food processor and it's the best one i've ever owned. I like their products.
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a great juicer! I've tried many types of fruits and veggies -- all great results for juices. One thing I have noticed is fruit like pineapple-- the pulp isn't entirely dry, so maybe stick to blending that type of fruit to get the maximum juice content. Other than that, amazing cleaning -- all the parts that need to be cleaned detach easily and clean up only takes a few minutes, even comes with a little brush for the inner strainer part which is great. Highly recommend -- for the price, a great juicer overall!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Juices well but very loud. I previously has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Juices well but very loud. I previously has a Lalane juicer and i was hoping based on the reveiws i read of the hamilton that it would be similar. It leaves behind a lot of watse. More so than my previous juicer. Also, the spout that the juice pours out of is not ajustable, thia means that while you drink you juice, it still drips on your counter. The price is fair for the product, especially if your new to juicing. But if you're a avid juicer, you might be dissapointed witht this product.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: It did most of the work.
customer_reviews.text: So when I read the reviews I was apprehensive. I tried it out today and it was very easy to use. The noise wasn’t too loud, what I would expect from this sized machine. The pulp was really moist. I was able to get another bottle (12oz) from just the pulp, after ringing it out with a cheese cloth. The clean up was easy with the brush that came with package. But with what I paid for it, I’m not complaining. Hopefully this last me a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: It really gets the juice out doesn’t waste a drop
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Really gets the juice out, easy to use and easy to clean if you do it right the way you won’t have to soak it. And it works just is great as the $200 juicers do I had more expensive ones bf no need to pay more, unless they got a specific feature you’re looking for that this one doesn’t have I can’t even think of what that might be. I’m happy with it I recommend it. Hope this is helpful Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it on Monday and received it on Tuesday. I was shocked but pleasantly surprised. I have an older Hamilton Beach juicer, but it is hard to clean and doesn't juice as effectively. This juicer is sooooo much easier to clean; you literally rinse it out. It comes with a brush for further assistance. It juices well and the juice has a sweetness to it and it tastes good, even the carrot and celery juice. The only issue is that it's a little loud, which was just like my older Hamilton Beach juicer. However, that's a small price to pay for a cheap juicer that is this effective.
customer_reviews.author: LNB

customer_reviews.title: Not premium and not big mouth. Broke. Big junk
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design, cheap plastic. Large pieces of fruit or vegetables don’t go through at all, despite what is advertised. The juicer gets clogged easily. The pulp rarely even makes it to the pulp container. It all gets clogged either in the metal part itself or in the plastic above. Pulp receptacle’s bottom was broken and a very sharp broken off piece almost cut my hand. A pain to wash. I have nothing good to say about this juicer. It’s an all-around terrible product. Save yourself a $100 and get something else. Update: Broke on third use. Plastic inside basically burned. See photo
customer_reviews.author: N.S.K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good juicer. It works well and extracts a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good juicer. It works well and extracts a lot of juice. I found it doesn't last a long time if using everyday. Mine lasted on average of about 9 months. I have purchased about 4 the these juicers and will continue to do so. I bought the expensive Breville juicer and that one didn't last much longer than a year; and it did not extract the juice as well as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Trend

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a good product. It will have issues if you don't attach all the parts correctly (this is when you will get the leaking some people describe). It really is easy to clean. I suggest putting a bag inside the container to catch the pulp. Not only will you be able to compost the material, but it is also WAY easier to clean. It's pulp is pretty "wet" but overall a Good machine.
customer_reviews.author: GJD

customer_reviews.title: Very good juicer with powerful blending power
customer_reviews.text: A very good juicer. First of all, the blending power is very good. All manners of fruits/vegetables are blended up to be a real juice, instead of smoothies where you can still feel the "thickness" of the fruit juice. All of it are blended perfectly creating a smooth flowing juice. From my experience, this is one of the best blender on the regard of blending power. Cleaning is easy. Ease of use is similar with other juicers: easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I started making our own fruit blends. This machine has been great. The cleaning brush provided eases cleaning of the blender assembly. Only downside is the juice pour spout is low so won’t fit sports bottle under. Solution was to use a two cup measuring cup which actually worked out because two cups fills the glass bottles we also bought.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: It's like they cannot handle the veggies
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. The first one I bought started to burn (smoke came out) so I got a replacement. This second one shakes uncontrollably! It's like they cannot handle the veggies. I'm only doing carrot, cucumber, celery, green apple and lemon drinks, nothing out of this world. The Jack Lalanne my father has had for over the years works better than this Hamilton Beach. This machine also makes a TON of noise! I don't really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Quick and efficient juicing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this juicer for a while now, and I'm liking it so far. It's very efficient and powerful, quickly turning veggies and fruits into juice. The design of the pulp bin does make it a little harder to clean, since you have to use a sink sprayer or a different brush than the one that came with the juicer to get the tiny little shreds of pulp out of all the molded nooks and crannies where it tends to collect and adhere. A completely rounded, smoother design for the pulp bin would probably help a lot with that. But as for its performance, the juicer definitely delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, simple and great design!
customer_reviews.text: Easy easy to clean it isn’t, i mean, not a single juice maker it is, but this one is really simple to clean and it came with a little brush! If I can do it twice a day, you can do it too. I love it, change my meals, now I drink juices everyday, carrots, orange, pineapples, cucumber, celery, everything it’s juicible with this thing.... juicible? Yeah, juicible... yep
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Agustin Palmero

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for price
customer_reviews.text: As a juicing newbie I was worried about getting something that wasn’t $125+. I was mistaken this is awesome, I juiced well, easy to clean. The noise didn’t bother me, comparable to a blender. I love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a loved one!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a friend of mine that was going through health problems. This product completely changed his life in a positive way and he uses this in his everyday regiment. It still works and he uses it every single day. If you have a loved one that has health problems and is looking for something to help them change their diet and lifestyle this is the perfect gift at a good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy DeSousa

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: I was new to juicing, and to be honest I didnt like it. It's hard to set up and clean after. It is so big and clunky, and doesnt fit in any of my cabinets. I would recommend just a regular blender. Eat your whole foods! Other than my personal problems with it, the machine itself was great...if this is something you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskers2007

customer_reviews.title: Leafy Greens are a NO
customer_reviews.text: This juicer was easy to put together for the novice juicer like myself. I’ve noticed already that it’s not going to hold up to juicing a lot of leafy greens like Kale, Swiss chard etc. I’ve only made like 5 juices of which 3 out of the 5 contained leafy greens. Already, this juicer is not extracting all the juice. My juice contained a lot of bits and lumps. I emptied and cleaned it before resuming to juice. It still wasn’t juicing like it was. Back to Amazon it will go. I enjoy juicing so I’m going to invest in a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Dockery

customer_reviews.title: Very Noisy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a juicer once before and this juicer is a lot louder! It’s very loud. I couldn’t believe how low it was, it almost seemed like there was something wrong with it.. but it worked. It made the juice. It is easy to take apart and put back together. Easy to clean especially if you rinse it off directly after use. I wish it was more quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, not strong enough for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok juicer but it leaves WAY too much juice in the pulp. I feel like we were loosing way too much money and wasting fruit using more to get enough juice because we were loosing so much juice in the pulp left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works with all kinds of veggies
customer_reviews.text: Tried out first time...works ok on leafy greens, broccoli...the juice has lot of foam...oxidises more but it is fast and easy to use....carrots come out very good....extremely good amount of carrot juice, so far happy about performance...it takes a lot of time to clean the inner steel sieve/ juicer part......all other components are very easy to clean.....if will be a pain if it dries up....so clean immediately after use.
customer_reviews.author: aadithya s.

customer_reviews.title: Juicy Juice Finally
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. I first bought the Black and Decker, 400-Watt Juice Extractor. It did not extract very well and the pulp was very wet and not chopped well. After a week it started to malfunction. I decided to upgrade and I am glad that I did. This one really works well, extracts so much better leaving less pulp and its very dry. It does not leak and the noise is less that the B&D. I recommend this one for the price. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Yonys Crespo

customer_reviews.title: Only used for celery, wasn’t impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t impressed with this juicer. However, I only used this to juice celery. One bunch of celery stalks, I had to clean out the top twice. You can’t really put too large a glass underneath it. Pain to clean, the brush that comes with it is nice though. I don’t know how it is to juice anything else. That’s my reference to this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Iloveolives

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this February 2020...worked last week..got everything ready and tried to turn it on and nothing! Called Hamilton they said they were closed and disconnected me. You have to run pulp back through juicer as it doesnt justice everything. Its a nightmare to clean...and ..Obviously dosen't work! Now I'm stuck here with fruit read to be juiced and I have no juicer. Cant go buy one ... the stores aren't carrying these items...or I have to wait 2 days or long for a delivery. I dont think the fruit will wait. Completely disappointed in this brand!!! Will never buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my prior juicer. Easy to use and clean, dislike that I need to pry the mesh with a spoon to dislodge it every time! Easier to clean than my last one. Motor can be better, but works well. Will go slow when it encounters the pineaple core, but will juice it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She's Got a Big Mouth, But I Still Love Her.
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful juicer for a great price. I have fallen in love with Hamilton Beach products lately because they are affordable without sacrificing quality. (I also bought an Air Fryer recently that I love). This juicer works well, it's easy to assemble and easy to clean up. My first glass of celery juice was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Monique

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Super easy to use! People complaining of violent shaking aren’t prepping their fruits and veggies prior to juicing. Carrot ends need to be chopped and I remove the core of an apple before juicing. As long as you do this you will have a great experience with your juicer. As well I don’t feel this puts off a lot of foam. And it does a great job extracting the juice so you’re getting the most out of your produce. It does leave behind some pulp but nothing crazy. this is a great purchase especially for the cost point. You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: G Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and easy to clean except supporting body Except a cup is missing to obtain downfall juice..
customer_reviews.author: Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Pieces of metal came off into juice. Soooo dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Take a look at this picture. I have had the juicer and thought it was great until this morning when I noticed while hand washing that a piece of metal is now missing and that means it was ground into my juice this morning. My husband already drank the juice before I saw this. I am praying he doesn’t get cut inside. Sooooo dangerous. Do not buy this it is not worth getting your throat or intestines cut. Now since I have it 6 weeks it says I can’t even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing juicer for the money
customer_reviews.text: The price says it all It'll get the job done but don't expect dry pulp it's pretty wet and does leave quite a bit of waste But for beginner juicers who don't feel like spending the 100's of dollars on a juicer this juicer will get you going and it'll get you through the rough patch of juicing life style You can upgrade later and gift this to someone who's looking into a juice life style
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is powerful but it’s noisy and messy!!
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews warned about the noise & man were they right. It is obnoxiously loud! But that doesn’t bother me as much as the fact that it super messy (I’m talking juice and debris coming out of everywhere) which is why I don’t use it. To make a simple juice I have to clean up the counter and surrounding area because it splatters everywhere. I wish I would of just saved the money and found something easier to use
customer_reviews.author: Gisell Langelier

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and not noisy. The downside is I just made one glass of green juice and i found out that the waste is still really moist if i press it there's still juice. And some of the veggies still not fully shredded. I put the waste to the juicer and i got 1/5 glass of juice. So compared to what i paid i guess i'll keep it until i buy more expensive one
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: It’s a medium size juicer he doesn’t take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get a chance to test the product out to let you know if it really juice good or if it was easy to clean. In the instructions it says that it came with a cup and it did not so I returned it and was given a replacement and it still didn’t have a cup. Because I didn’t come with the cup like I thought I returned it
customer_reviews.author: KeithaNichole

customer_reviews.title: HERE IS A CASE-YOU GET WHAT YOU PAID FOR+
customer_reviews.text: it is easy to use. but DOES not extract ALL THE JUICE from whatever+ but THE "PRICE IS RIGHT"! IF YOU WANNA JUST JUICE OCCASIONALLY. HAD THE BEST JUICER EVER-ACME---WHICH GOOGLE SAYS "WAS CREATED FOR ROAD-RUNNER" ACME IS A REAL COMPANY+++
customer_reviews.author: Regena

customer_reviews.title: Okay budget juicer but Incredibly loud
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little juicer that's easy to clean I had two main issues: 1. the blade isn't the most powerful, I was making a ginger juice and the ginger got jarred on the blade. I don't think it could handle the harder fruit/vegetables 2. It's so incredibly loud, it sounds like I'm doing construction work in my apartment. Nothing really can drown out the noise... On the above two notes I probably would've spent a bit more money and gotten something better quality
customer_reviews.author: BP1234567

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use juicer and works quick!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is basic and easy to use. It didn't come with a cup like I expected but that's ok. It comes apart easily for cleaning and comes with a brush which works good for scrubbing the food from the blades. It also holds A LOT of pulp, do you can juice for awhile without needing to dump it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabconn

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Juicer Machine, Big Mouth 3” Feed Chute, Centrifugal, Easy to Clean, BPA Free, 800W, (67601A), Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:JuicerLooking for an ideal juice drink that's fresh, free of preservatives and tastes 10 times better than store-bought juices? Take the plunge and go with the big mouth juice extractor from Hamilton Beach. It packs all the punch you would expect from a Hamilton Beach juice extractor: Reliable efficiency, high speed and no-fuss cleanup.
feature_bullets: Healthy, homemade juice in seconds- juice a variety of fruits and vegetables. Juicer is easy to assemble with extra-large pulp bin. Juice cup not included

Extra-large 3 inch feed chute fits whole fruits and vegetables- fit a whole apple, a peeled orange or a handful of kale. Less precutting, and more continuous juicing for fresh fruit juice, vegetable juice, or nutrient packed celery juice
Easy to clean - Removable parts are dishwasher safe and BPA free
Powerful electric motor for maximum juice: 800w of power can turn a dense beet into smooth juice in seconds
3 year limited from the bestselling juice extractor brand- includes access to dedicated USA customer support team of Hamilton beach employees

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars7,131 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
